about_the_game:
Welcome all players to join the official QQ discussion group: 743954971

In the cave, raise a toast to Impermanence,
On the Bridge of No Return, resent the King of Hell.
With a swing of the iron stick, demons are startled,
My fate is determined by me, not by the heavens.

Game Features:

  • The staff automatically attacks enemies.

  • Combine various staff spells with different elements.

  • Execute finishing moves with a combination of five staff spells!

  • Set in the underworld and hell from Chinese mythology, with randomly generated levels.

  • Infuse your iron staff with materials, freely adjust its attributes, and create your unique iron stick.

  • Each wave of demon attacks lasts 60-90 seconds. Find ways to defeat as many enemies as possible and survive during this period!

  • Collect charms and materials dropped by demons, and during the intervals between each wave, draw and combine your staff techniques!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Alas is an Top-down, light roguelike game focused on melee combat. Players can freely combine various staff spells to create different finishing moves, repelling the demons in hell, break through the underworld, defeat the Kings of Hell, and have their names erased from the Book of Life and Death.
